articles.author: Tom Nicholson
articles.title: Slovak presidency goes to PM Fico's proxy - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Victory by Peter Pellegrini gives the ruling coalition total control over the executive and legislative branches in Bratislava.
articles.content: The opposition-backed Korok said he saw no reason to send Slovak soldiers to fight in neighboring Ukraine, but added that he supported Kyiv in its war against invading Russian forces because “Ukraine… [+1555 chars]
